alert.note: Alert for Antelope Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 4:05AM PST until January 30 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow is expected. Additional snowfall of up to two inches possible, highest in the foothills above 3000 feet. * WHERE...Antelope Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery and dangerous road conditions are expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may affect travel on portions of Highway 14 and Highway 138. Snow may reach the Antelope Valley floor at times this morning, then turn back to rain by midday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
